EmailTemplate.name: CWD Grad invite S London 2pm
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
INVITATION TO YOUR GRADUATION
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Congratulations you have completed your Challenge with Distinction!
We would love to reward you with your certificate at the 2011 Graduation Ceremony.
Please let us know if you are coming.
RSVP by clicking on the following link: http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3a13301d9d6cbaa&q1={!Lead.Id}&q2=1
Where: Dulwich College Dulwich Common London SE21 7LD
When: 30/10/2011
14:00 - 16:30
www.the-challenge.org
facebook.com/thechallengenetwork
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
